overview: While out driving on a lone deserted road, a storm forces four unsuspecting friends to seek refuge in a seemingly abandoned house. However, they are not alone in this house and feel the presence of some other-worldly beings. During the night they are constantly being visited and harassed by ghosts. As we follow the not-so-harrowing adventures of this night we can be sure that this will be one night that these four horny guys will never forget!
title: Phantom of Lust
